item.title: [Delta] Custom Shops
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

I want to make a custom shop that takes 7775 as a currency instead of gp. I have the shop set up in shops.cfg with this code:

and the this code in client.java

} else if (NPCID == 587) { // Sacrafice shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43;

Please help!

Read full topic
